description: UNE's value-driven economic model that replaces profit motive with value motive, using democratically-defined Values as the primary metric for economic success and compensation. A post-scarcity framework designed to eliminate poverty and oligarchy through dynamic incentives, transparent algorithms, and dual-currency circulation.

value_motive.definition: The primary economic incentive is accumulation of Value—a composite metric of alignment with democratically-ratified UNE Values—replacing the profit motive of capitalism.
value_motive.purpose: Drives individuals and businesses to undertake activities beneficial to themselves and society simultaneously, optimizing for flourishing rather than efficiency alone.

contrast_with_profit_motive.profit_motive: Driver of efficiency; agnostic to social/environmental costs; engine of scarcity-based economics.
contrast_with_profit_motive.value_motive: Driver of flourishing; optimizes for beneficial output; engine of abundance-based economics.

value_metric.definition: Economic success measured by contributions aligning with UNE Values, quantified into Units (primary currency) and distributed by Economists.
value_metric.mechanism: Every Value serves as an income stream; citizens submit claims via PALs for Value-aligned actions; Economists assess and quantify Value.
value_metric.universal_application: No 'valueless' jobs; all socially beneficial work aligns with at least one Value.

intelligently_designed_markets.principle: System shapes incentive landscapes via democratic input and decentralized oversight without commanding outcomes.
levers: General Fund as strategic market participant

units.purpose: Currency of need; used for necessities (housing, food, healthcare, production materials)
characteristics: Digital blockchain currency with full traceability
Managed by Economists and AIs per democratic priorities
Subject to Circulation Cap and Maximum Wage limits
inflation_control: Physical paper Unit auctions for Overflow

overflow.purpose: Currency of desire; used for luxuries (fine dining, entertainment, additional properties)
characteristics: Generated when Units exceed Maximum Wage threshold
Cannot be reinvested in means of production
Corporations must distribute to employees as bonuses
acquisition: Participation in system via transaction velocity

income_levels.structure: 10-tier system (IL 1-10) where higher levels correspond to greater societal contributions and costs
income_levels.progressive_responsibility: Higher ILs pay more for necessities via IL-based cost scaling, effectively subsidizing lower levels

il_1.description: Basic safety net; minimal costs and Overflow generation; universal basic income guarantee
il_1.lifestyle: Studio/tiny housing, ride sharing, minimal recreation

il_2_9.description: Gradual increase in costs and benefits; upward mobility ladder
il_2_9.characteristics: Grander housing, personal vehicles, vacations proportional to level
il_2_9.typical_distribution: Majority of population between IL 5-8 with ~30-hour work weeks

apex_level.description: Maximum wage; highest contributors subsidize system
apex_level.maintenance: Requires constant innovation/impact; most churn out within 1-2 years
apex_level.privileges: Can direct Overflow to specific initiatives

income_levels.cost_scaling_algorithm: Final Price = Base Price × IL^0.3 (costs rise slower than income)

circulation_cap.definition: Hard ceiling on wealth accumulation in Units; prevents hoarding and capital concentration
circulation_cap.mechanism: Upon reaching Maximum Wage, excess Units convert to fractions of Overflow and redirect to General Fund
circulation_cap.purpose: Forces constant capital recirculation; prevents entrenched aristocracy

maximum_wage.definition: Highest net worth threshold for individuals in Units
maximum_wage.adjustment: Regularly reviewed based on economic conditions and societal values
maximum_wage.enforcement: Rigorous AI auditing and Observer System monitoring

general_funds.funding: Percentage of every transaction contributes to all three levels
uses: Aspirational venture capital for high-risk, high-Value technologies
Consumer of last resort for essential goods
general_funds.governance: Managed by Economists per democratic priorities set in Forum

economists.role: Professional class responsible for Value assessment, Unit flow management, and economic system oversight
economists.mandate: Dual responsibility: increasing quality of life and promoting commercial dynamism
evolution_phases: Phase 1: Human Economists arbitrate all claims (training data generation)
Phase 2: AI suggests rulings based on precedent (human review for edge cases)
Phase 3: Mature AI handles most claims (Economists focus on system architecture)

value_assessment_constitution.purpose: Immutable, hierarchically-ordered rules governing all economic algorithms
characteristics: Publicly ratified; amendable only by supermajority national vote
Precedent database continuously analyzed for VAC compliance

constitutional_council.composition: Rotating body of Senior Economists, elected Jurists, and civic members (sortition from IL-3+)
constitutional_council.function: Guardians of VAC; must approve all changes to Economist AI operational code
constitutional_council.sortition_process: Random selection from qualified citizens; service preferred but voluntary

transparency_framework.value_ledger: Public code on all goods/services showing resource origin, costs, and corporate information
transparency_framework.open_economic_data: Anonymized significant datasets available to all citizens for analysis and audit
transparency_framework.ai_decision_auditability: All AI economic decisions transparent and reviewable

transaction_friction.purpose: Generates Units through computational work of transactions; ties currency creation to economic vitality
transaction_friction.value_alignment: Dynamic adjustment: high-Value transactions have near-zero friction; low-Value transactions are computationally expensive

calls_to_investment.definition: Direct public investment mechanism replacing traditional debt financing
calls_to_investment.mechanism: Individuals/companies issue investment calls via social platforms; investors contribute Units for Overflow returns
characteristics: Investment in Units, returns in Overflow
Employees have voting stakes in organizations

nudge_tax.purpose: Counteracts 'Value-System Gaming' (exploiting letter of Values while violating spirit)
nudge_tax.mechanism: Temporary reduction in Value-to-Unit conversion rate for detected bad faith patterns
process: Independent AIs monitor for bad faith patterns
Economists levy fines with transparent rationale
Appealable through peer review and Justice
examples_of_bad_faith: Superficial projects designed solely for Units
Consistent operation at ethical limits damaging public trust

integration_with_une_values.economic_interpretation: Acknowledges violence as transformative force; Units for ethical application/management
Human interaction as inherent value; incentivizes community building
Enlightened self-interest; rewards innovation with spillover benefits
Proactivity and engagement multiplier; rewards consistent participation
Value in creation/pursuit over ownership; rewards creators and experience facilitators
Resilience and collaborative problem-solving; rewards solution creation
Trust as social currency with compounding returns; rewards trustworthiness and transparency systems
Sufficiency and equitable distribution; rewards charity and efficient resource management
Self-mastery and mental discipline; rewards professions requiring extreme focus
Suffering as catalyst for empathy and community support; rewards alleviation and support systems
Iterative progress over static perfection; rewards demonstrable improvement
Liberty through choice and responsibility; rewards opportunity creation and protection

merit_democracy.integration: Economic policies set via democratic referendums; Economists implement voter-decided priorities
merit_democracy.funding_flow: General Funds allocated per national/state/district votes
merit_democracy.oversight: Economists monitored by Diplomats and Justice; significant changes require democratic review

warden_system.integration: Wardens generate Value across multiple categories; education/military/contract tours all economically quantified
warden_system.economic_role: Largest unified economic block; significant influence on Value generation patterns

pal_system.integration: PALs submit Value claims, negotiate with Economists, manage personal finances, enforce IL-based costing

justice_system.integration: Justice levies fines for Value violations; Economists enforce economic sanctions
justice_system.collaboration: Joint handling of economic crimes and bad faith gaming

eliminated_traditional_structures.traditional_banking: ELIMINATED - Functions redistributed to PALs (storage/payments) and Calls to Investment/Geneal Fund (capital allocation)
eliminated_traditional_structures.debt_based_financing: VIRTUALLY ELIMINATED - Replaced by investment-for-Overflow model; IL-1 safety net removes need for high-risk debt
eliminated_traditional_structures.private_insurance: GREATLY REDUCED - State guarantees basic needs; luxury insurance niche market in Overflow
eliminated_traditional_structures.stock_market: MEANINGFULLY CHANGED - Speculation replaced by Calls to Investment; returns in Overflow only, no control over means of production
eliminated_traditional_structures.taxation: ELIMINATED - Redistribution built into IL-based cost scaling and Circulation Cap at point of sale

anti_hoarding_mechanisms: Transaction velocity requirements for luxury currency
corruption_prevention: Transparent Value Ledger and open data
systemic_stability: Guaranteed IL-1 safety net ('poverty is illegal')
Dynamic incentive tuning for labor allocation
General Fund as consumer of last resort
ethical_boundaries: VAC governance of all economic algorithms
Nudge Tax for bad faith gaming
evolutionary_design: Hacker class paid to expose vulnerabilities
Regular Maximum Wage and algorithm reviews

system_analysis.design_philosophy: Post-scarcity economics engineered to align individual success with societal flourishing through transparent, algorithmic incentives and democratic oversight.
core_innovations: Direct public investment replacing debt financing
'Poverty is illegal' guarantee as economic axiom
system_analysis.type_1_civilization_alignment: Demonstrates planetary-scale economic management through integrated value systems, sustainable resource use, and equitable distribution mechanisms.
system_analysis.invitational_note: This system represents a viable economic operating system for complex civilization—transforming scarcity-based competition into abundance-based collaboration while maintaining innovation incentives and individual agency within a democratically-defined ethical framework.
